    Modulating pH in an Aquaculture Microbiome Diet Interventions as Ecological Shifts Postpartum Community Remodeling

    Build a ts

    ts_from_dfs.Rd

    Build a ts

    Usage

    ts_from_dfs(reads, interventions, metadata, subject_data = NULL)

    Examples

    library(mbtransfer)
library(tibble)
subject <- read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40275934/subject.csv")
#> Error in read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40275934/subject.csv"): could not find function "read_csv"
interventions <- read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40279171/interventions.csv") |>
column_to_rownames("sample")
#> Error in read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40279171/interventions.csv"): could not find function "read_csv"
reads <- read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40279108/reads.csv") |>
 column_to_rownames("sample")
#> Error in read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40279108/reads.csv"): could not find function "read_csv"
samples <- read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40275943/samples.csv")
#> Error in read_csv("https://figshare.com/ndownloader/files/40275943/samples.csv"): could not find function "read_csv"
ts <- as.matrix(reads) |>
  ts_from_dfs(interventions, samples, subject)
#> Error in unique(metadata$subject): object 'samples' not found
ts
#> function (data = NA, start = 1, end = numeric(), frequency = 1, 
#>     deltat = 1, ts.eps = getOption("ts.eps"), class = if (nseries > 
#>         1) c("mts", "ts", "matrix") else "ts", names = if (!is.null(dimnames(data))) colnames(data) else paste("Series", 
#>         seq(nseries))) 
#> {
#>     if (is.data.frame(data)) 
#>         data <- data.matrix(data)
#>     if (is.matrix(data)) {
#>         nseries <- ncol(data)
#>         ndata <- nrow(data)
#>         dimnames(data) <- list(NULL, names)
#>     }
#>     else {
#>         nseries <- 1
#>         ndata <- length(data)
#>     }
#>     if (ndata == 0) 
#>         stop("'ts' object must have one or more observations")
#>     if (missing(frequency)) 
#>         frequency <- 1/deltat
#>     else if (missing(deltat)) 
#>         deltat <- 1/frequency
#>     if (frequency > 1 && 0 < (d <- abs(frequency - round(frequency))) && 
#>         d < ts.eps) 
#>         frequency <- round(frequency)
#>     if (!missing(start)) 
#>         start <- as.numeric(start)
#>     if (length(start) > 1L) {
#>         start <- start[1L] + (start[2L] - 1)/frequency
#>     }
#>     if (!missing(end)) 
#>         end <- as.numeric(end)
#>     if (length(end) > 1L) {
#>         end <- end[1L] + (end[2L] - 1)/frequency
#>     }
#>     if (missing(end)) 
#>         end <- start + (ndata - 1)/frequency
#>     else if (missing(start)) 
#>         start <- end - (ndata - 1)/frequency
#>     if (start > end) 
#>         stop("'start' cannot be after 'end'")
#>     cycles <- as.numeric((end - start) * frequency)
#>     if (abs(round(cycles) - cycles) > ts.eps * max(cycles, 1)) 
#>         stop("'end' must be a whole number of cycles after 'start'")
#>     nobs <- floor(cycles + 1.01)
#>     if (nobs != ndata) 
#>         data <- if (NCOL(data) == 1) {
#>             if (ndata < nobs) 
#>                 rep_len(data, nobs)
#>             else if (ndata > nobs) 
#>                 data[1L:nobs]
#>         }
#>         else {
#>             if (ndata < nobs) 
#>                 data[rep_len(1L:ndata, nobs), ]
#>             else if (ndata > nobs) 
#>                 data[1L:nobs, ]
#>         }
#>     attr(data, "tsp") <- c(start, end, frequency)
#>     if (!is.null(class) && class[[1]] != "none") 
#>         attr(data, "class") <- class
#>     data
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x7f948f77ace8>
#> <environment: namespace:stats>
